channel.title: Need a command
channel.description:
Hello i need a command to restart my server so that if i typed ::restart it would run the autostarter and restart the server
The server base is PimpScape
I rep u if u can figure it out, thanks

item.title: Need a command
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“bakatool, post:4, topic:160998”]something like this…

import java.lang.Runtime;
import java.lang.Process;

if(Command.equals(“restart”)) {
Runtime closeServer = Runtime.getRuntime();
try {
Process p = closeServer.exec(“c:\server\run.bat”);
System.exit(1); //Close server
} catch(Exception e) {}
}

it might not work cuz it starts a new server before it closes the first server so

just edit your run.bat by adding

tskill java line first which will turn all java processes off than
java server

so you could remove System.exit(1); if you want too.[/quote]
l2multiplatform.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a command
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

something like this…

import java.lang.Runtime;
import java.lang.Process;

if(Command.equals(“restart”)) {
Runtime closeServer = Runtime.getRuntime();
try {
Process p = closeServer.exec(“c:\server\run.bat”);
System.exit(1); //Close server
} catch(Exception e) {}
}

it might not work cuz it starts a new server before it closes the first server so

just edit your run.bat by adding

tskill java line first which will turn all java processes off than
java server

so you could remove System.exit(1); if you want too.
